< post author = " dakota44 " datetime = " 2008 - 10 - 09T22 : 42 : 00 " id = " p1 " >
At McCain rallies they are pumping up the crowd before McCain and Palin come out by trashing Obama and calling him Husein Obama .
This is followed by Palin basically accusing him of being a terrorist based on his limited association with Ayers .
At one rally during the " terrorist " part of her accusations , someone shouted out " Kill him " to which she supposedly replied , " I want to kill em too " .

sentence: Now I feel sure that if she said that , she referred to a victory in the election , but what did that redneck idiot who shouted out " Kill him " think as the crowd roared ?
This drumming up of unwarranted hatred for Obama is dangerous and a sick picture of the inside the Republican base .
It could produce a tragic consequence .
I certainly hope not .

< post author = " Poppy girl " datetime = " 2008 - 10 - 10T01 : 15 : 00 " id = " p2 " >
< quote orig _ author = " dakota44 " >
At McCain rallies they are pumping up the crowd before McCain and Palin come out by trashing Obama and calling him Husein Obama .
This is followed by Palin basically accusing him of being a terrorist based on his limited association with Ayers .
At one rally during the " terrorist " part of her accusations , someone shouted out " Kill him " to which she supposedly replied , " I want to kill em too " .
Now I feel sure that if she said that , she referred to a victory in the election , but what did that redneck idiot who shouted out " Kill him " think as the crowd roared ?
This drumming up of unwarranted hatred for Obama is dangerous and a sick picture of the inside the Republican base .
It could produce a tragic consequence .
I certainly hope not .
